data.text: Me ba, yɛ aso ma me nyansa;
sɛdeɛ ɛbɛma woahwɛ yie,
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔbaa dwamanfoɔ ano sosɔ ɛwoɔ,
nanso, awieeɛ no ɛyɛ nwono sene bɔnwoma,
Ne nan kɔ owuo mu;
Ɔnnwene ɛkwan a ɛkɔ nkwa mu ho;
Enti, afei, me mma, montie me;
Ɛkwan a ɛmmɛn noɔ no na momfa so
anyɛ saa a, mode mo ahoɔden bɛma afoforɔ
anyɛ saa a, ahɔhoɔ bɛfom mo ahonyadeɛ
Mo nkwanna akyi, mobɛsi apinie
Na moaka sɛ, “Na mekyiri ahohyɛsoɔ!
Manyɛ ɔsetie amma mʼakyerɛkyerɛfoɔ
Maduru ɔsɛeɛ ntɛntɛnoa
Nom nsuo firi wʼankasa ankorɛ mu,
Ɛsɛ sɛ wo nsutire yiri fa mmɔntene so
Ma ɛnyɛ wo nko ara dea,
Nhyira nka wʼasubura
Ɔte sɛ ɔtwe bereɛ dɔfoɔ, ɔwansane animuonyamfoɔ.
Me ba, adɛn enti na woma ɔbaa dwamanfoɔ kyekyere wo?
Awurade hunu onipa akwan nyinaa,
Omumuyɛfoɔ nnebɔne sum no afidie;
Ɔbɛwu ɛsiane ahohyɛsoɔ a ɔnni enti,
